items.title: Pepsi shares jump as activist Elliott takes $4 billion stake, sees 'historic' value opportunity
items.description: The Paul Singer-founded Elliott's bet in Pepsi is worth $4 billion, becoming the consumer giant's top five active investors excluding index funds.

items.title: Pickleball is just getting started in China
items.description: Online sales of pickleball paddles and related equipment in China have skyrocketed, according to data from WPIC Marketing + Technologies.
